text:
I just visit the 313   Gardian
Bad service… just ask her.   Do you have mask? She show me there there.   The face very angry.   Then I ask again. Do you have by box ?   She so angry and  just over there. But I don’t see..then she Come and show me.   Here here.  With the angry sound and very angry face.   Don’t go and buy there.   24/3 mornings.
This is not a pharmacy - there is no pharmacist available. I wasted time walking here while unwell just to be told it wasn’t a pharmacy - don’t go if you need medical assistance.

Male Pharmacist with glasses and big ears 招风耳先生 doesn't like his job, grumpy and impatient when I had questions. Maybe Guardian should pay him much higher salary like 200k or more per year, so he can treat customers with better attitude.
just want to update that this branch no longer has a pharmacy section.

Worst pharmacist ever. Basically I can’t find the paracetamol because it was crowded at the medication section, so I went to ask him at the pharmacist’s counter. He regards everyone with contempt. If he hates his job he should quit. A stain to the service standards of all healthcare professionals. I would give a 0 but that’s not possible, so I give you a 1.

To add, he doesn’t wear his mask properly, only wears it by hanging it on his spectacle frames.
